name: Stone Age
description: Archaic humans first use to tools.

name: Ancient Era
description: Our species, Homo Sapiens appear, spawning the beginning of human civilization.

name: Grain
description: Human species start eating cereal. The breakfast staple.

name: Bigger Brain
description: The Cerebrel cortex of the brain is formed, responsible for the regulation of conscious life.

name: Dog
description: Humans have started domesticating man's best friend.

name: Art
description: Humans have started to visualize ourselves in art. Artsy!

name: Agricultural
description: Agriculture Revolution starts in the Levant (Eastern Mediterranean region of Western Asia).

name: City-states
description: A concentration of humans with domesticated livestock and plants.

name: Animal Husbandry
description: Humans have successfully domesticated animals.

name: Irrigation
description: Water system to supply water for crops and livestock

name: Religion
description: Our collective imagination of in spiritual entities are stronger than ever and have pushed us to cooperate in building the first places of worship.

name: Traders
description: Long distance Trading among different communities is a thing now

name: Writing
description: Writing is first developed as a system to keep track of taxes.

name: Fire
description: A powerful ally that allowed an advantage in nature.

name: Meat Eaters
description: Animal meat becomes a staple of our diets.

name: Currency
description: Bronze coins is used to establish medium ground in trade.

name: Warriors
description: Humans first wage war against one another. The first of many.

name: Monarchy
description: Though not this first monarch in history, this marks a dawn of the rule of kings, usually from a divine right.

name: Slavery
description: Though slavery has been around couple mellenia before. This was the first time, it came under a emperical rule.

name: Empire
description: Political rule has lead to the quest and conquer of people and territories.

name: Law
description: First code of law is written.

name: Military
description: An empire cannot exist without an army.

name: Hinduism
description: One of humanities oldest religions is founded in the Indus Valley.

name: Time
description: Humans start to conceptualize as well as find means to track and measure time.

name: Judaism
description: Though Judaism has been around. The rise of Yahweh and the First Temple solidify this ancient religion.

name: Classical Era
description: Bronze becomes Iron and the beginnings of the age of Empires.

name: Daoism
description: China spawns Taoism or Daoism, "Dao" meaning "the Way".

name: Philosophy
description: With increased leisure time, some had more time to think than others.

name: Buddhism
description: The Indus Valley region spawns another ancient religion.

name: Monotheism
description: Monotheism is first recorded in a time and place where polytheism is practiced predominantly.

name: Democracy
description: "Demos" (common people) and "kratos" (strength)
